abstract: Comprehensive performance optimization guide for React Native applications, designed for AI agents and LLMs. Contains 35+ rules across 13 categories, prioritized by impact from critical (core rendering, list performance) to incremental (fonts, imports). Each rule includes explanations, incorrect vs correct examples, and impact metrics.
note: This document is mainly for agents and LLMs when maintaining, generating, or refactoring React Native codebases. Guidance is optimized for automation and consistency by AI-assisted workflows.
